      • createWebDriver

        org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createWebDriver(@NotNull
                                              @NotNull java.util.List<ProxyDetails<?>> proxies,
                                              @NotNull
                                              @NotNull java.util.List<java.io.File> tempFiles)
        Parameters:
        proxies - The list of proxies that are used when configuring the web driver
        tempFiles - maintains a list of temp files that are deleted once Iridium is closed
        Returns:
        A new instance of a webdriver

      • leaveWindowsOpen

        default boolean leaveWindowsOpen()
        Returns:
        true if webdriver instances should be quit after the feature or scenario has been run.
